name: The World Is Melon
description:
requires JRE8 (java 8) already installed on your computer to run!

How To Play

Click to spawn a melon. Use the other melons to free yourself from the bowl!

A submission for the libGDX game jam.

Apologies for the low-effort, and lack of an HTML playable version - this is mostly a learning experience!

@DeveloperDoge
